twice.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He was questioned by police twice yesterday.
None of our dinner menus are exactly the same twice over.
Letters were delivered twice a week only.
twice.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: two times more, bigger, better etc than something else
twice.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: They employ 90 people, twice as many as last year.
Interest rates are twice as high as those of our competitors.
an area twice the size of Britain
